text: I am an agnostic I do not pretend to know what many ignorant men are sure of.
author: Clarence Darrow

text: Certainly the best works, and of greatest merit for the public, have proceeded from the unmarried, or childless men.
author: Francis Bacon

text: By indignities men come to dignities.
author: Francis Bacon

text: Many men owe the grandeur of their lives to their tremendous difficulties.
author: Charles Spurgeon

text: All men were made by the Great Spirit Chief. They are all brothers.
author: Chief Joseph
